body.name: Sweetcrispy Ergonomic Office Chair, Mid Back Computer Chair with Adjustable Height, Swivel Chair with Flip-Up Arms and Lumbar Support(Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 3 hrs 57 mins
features: 🌳【Ergonomic Office Chair】The seat height and lumbar support can be adjusted up and down, front and back to ensure your comfort. At the same time, combined with the ergonomic design, you can work on this executive chair for hours every day without feeling tired.

🌳【Mesh High Backrest Design】The backrest of this computer office chair can be adjusted from 90° to 120°, you can lock it at any angle you want. At the same time, the 360° universal wheels can move freely, and the high backrest and headrest are made of mesh, which is super breathable and gives you high elastic support.

🌳【Comfortable Seat Cushion】Our seats are made of high-elastic mesh and high-elastic foam. It’s no secret that comfort is very important when it comes to sitting for extended periods of time. This mesh office chair retains its shape even if you sit for long periods of time.

🌳【Flip-Up Armrests】The armrests of this tall office chair can be flipped up or down to meet different needs. When the armrests flip up, the entire chair can easily be pushed under the table to maximize space. The desk chair's wide flip-up arms provide comfortable support for arms and hands.

🌳【Customer Guarantee】We believe you will love this mesh office chair.At the same time, our customer service team is always available to support you, and any questions we will respond to you within 24 hours.

Is there any tips to make the lock work? Please start in the upright position, reach down on the right side and push the lever in until it clicks, then lean back on the chair until it locks in your reclining position. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable chair for smaller spaces
reviews.reviewText: This is a simple, minimalist, no-frills chair. It is not considered "executive," which does not matter to me. The main reason I selected it was for the flip-up armrests. My home office is small (a bedroom), and I have limited space between the desk and the bed. This chair has been great thus far. The seat is comfortable to sit on for several hours at a time, and the mesh on the back makes it breathable. The chair has an adjustable back that can be adjusted to rock back and forth. The flip-up armrests let me push well into the desk after I am done working, thus giving me more space. The chair's height can be adjusted to accommodate short and tall people (I am 5ft 2in, and my husband is 6ft). I am the primary user, and having a chair that allows my feet to rest on the floor is great. Although I got this as a vine product, I consider the price to be excellent for the quality and versatility you will get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, simple design, easy set up!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this originally to use at my office/work but decided to keep it at home because it’s so convenient! My husband has even enjoyed it for gaming (it’s not a gaming chair, but he was using the couch before) and says it’s a nice chair! The seat itself isn’t overly padded, but the backrest is mesh and the chair is averagely comfortable. Setup was super easy, and you didn’t need any extra tools besides what came in the packaging (I definitely need this, because we don’t have any fancy tools at our house). It was quick to put together, and the directions were simple and straightforward. Plus you can adjust how much the chair rocks, and I like my chairs to easily sway back and forth. Good chair, would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great home office chair!
reviews.reviewText: This office chair is surprisingly comfortable for such a light chair. This chair is not meant to be an executive chair. This chair is designed for the active desk worker that needs comfort and mobility.The assembly took a bit longer than I expected but I was in a confined space.My biggest concern is the long-term durability of this chair. I have this concern with almost every office chair I have bought and assembled. Chairs start off well but over time, chairs start showing their weaknesses. And eventually, I have to discard the chair for one reason or another.I am 215lb. I tend to think that most chairs made today are not going to last super long if you are well over 200lb. It is just natural the chair will eventually weaken when you have a lot of weight on it vs. a smaller, lighter person sitting on it.It is a good chair and I am happy to have it. I simply think that based on the feel of the build material, the assembly, and my heavier weight, I expect this chair will eventually weaken.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars INCREDIBLE office CHAIR 🗄️🖇️🖥️
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was fairly simple with the included instructions. Once complete, you are rewarded with a super comfy office chair. The fidgety workers will be happy to know this has the “rocking” option. The arms on the chair lift up so that you can roll this into your desk when not in use. It height adjusts easily without any issues. I can drink my coffee then use the rocking option while working. It’s quite satisfying to say the least. I’m happy with it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, comfortable chair
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this chair for my home office. I was nervous about it since I had not been able to "test drive" it before I got it, but not to worry. It is extremely comfortable. It adjusts in every way possible for anyone to use of any size. It was easy to assemble and I'm happy with it. The back support is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This home office chair delivered as soon as expected, and was an easy one to assemble! It is steady, comfortable and looked durable. It comes with solid packing of screws and tool and don't need one your tool box. I have been using it for a while now, it's comfortable for sure, and no complaints to raise. Decent for the price range, and certainly recommended one for home office usage!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This chair was easy to assemble and is fairly comfortable. I would say it fits in it's price range as far as comfort and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This desk chair is extremely comfortable and light. The controls are very easy to manipulate and adjust to your specific desire. Assembly was fairly simple. If you have rudimentary skills, you should have no problem. Directions were clear and easy to follow. Chair arms can move to the up position in order to fit more easily under the desk. Great idea!Recommended
